person.bio: Marcelo Bohrer is a creative thinker, focused on design and innovation, passionate about bringing transformative ideas to life, and use them to make the world a better place. With extensive experience in using design thinking to develop solutions to complex scenarios, he created several enterprises with a wide impact such as the Nadism Club and the CyberorganicStuff. Marcelo also has a long track of spiritual investigation, especially about Buddhism.
person.excerpt: A creative thinker, focused on design and innovation, passionate about bringing transformative ideas to life.
